document_data.name: Talmar
document_data.mainbody: '''Tlassian Talmar Eldwing''' was a [[dragonborn]] scholar of [[Tymanther]] and the second-in-command of [[Clan Tlassian]] in [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|8}}
document_data.Description: Talmar was described as a bookish, middle-age dragonborn in 1479 DR. Despite being a scholar, Talmar had an impressive physique, thanks to his long years as a soldier in his youth.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|12}}
document_data.History: Talmar was one of the elders of Clan Tlassian in 1479 DR. He was also considered one of the most knowledgeable scholars in [[Djerad Thymar]], and was widely respected for his intelligence and his encyclopedic knowledge of military history.
